title: #92Noon! Guerin/Florio/Fish/Gleeman
description: Wild GM Bill Guerin starts the show discussing recent news and the outlook for the team's return to play, Florio's weekly pitstop, Mardy Fish checks in from out west, and Aaron Gleeman in studio for final hour!
itunes:summary: Wild GM Bill Guerin starts the show discussing recent news and the outlook for the team's return to play, Florio's weekly pitstop, Mardy Fish checks in from out west, and Aaron Gleeman in studio for final hour!
